subject: Re: FW: [Admin] Payment Proposal - 1/549 Old South Head Road, Rose Bay NSW 2029 - ACCEPTED
preview: Thanks so much Joel. We received an acceptance this morning for credit card and an invoice has been created so fingers crossed that means all is fixed!  Warm regards,  Jen Lovegrove  ASSISTANT TO SENI

full_threads.body:
Thanks so much Joel. We received an acceptance this morning for credit card and an invoice has been created so fingers crossed that means all is fixed!

Warm regards,

Jen Lovegrove

ASSISTANT TO SENIOR PROPERTY STYLISTS



+61 450 909 043



+61 2 9310 1611



jlovegrove@novaricollective.com



Tenancy 1, Unit 1, 14A Baker Street Banksmeadow NSW 2019



NOVARICOLLECTIVE.COM.AU







The content of this email is confidential and intended for the recipient specified only. It is strictly forbidden to share any part of this message with any third party without the sender's written consent. If you received this by mistake, please reply and delete it to avoid recurrence.

Hi Jen,

Thanks so much for your patience, and apologies again for the earlier confusion. Please feel free to disregard what I mentioned before.

We’ve now found a workaround to re-trigger the Xero connection. Would you be able to take a look and let me know if things are appearing correctly on your end?

If you notice any missing Xero drafts, just let me know and we’ll manually re-trigger them for you.

As for the duplicates, those were created while I was running some test fixes on the Xero connection — so no need to worry about them.

Appreciate you flagging this, and thank you again.

Hi Joel,

Thanks for looking into this.

Sorry I'm a little confused, invoices have always automatically generated for Pay later and Credit Card payments just like they did for EFT? Can we reset our settings so that we can continue receiving invoices like we did previously for all payment methods? Not sure how we've ended up with all these issues as I don't think we've changed any of our settings.

What do you need access to to help with the duplicates?

Warm regards,

Jen Lovegrove

ASSISTANT TO SENIOR PROPERTY STYLISTS



+61 450 909 043



+61 2 9310 1611



jlovegrove@novaricollective.com



Tenancy 1, Unit 1, 14A Baker Street Banksmeadow NSW 2019



NOVARICOLLECTIVE.COM.AU







The content of this email is confidential and intended for the recipient specified only. It is strictly forbidden to share any part of this message with any third party without the sender's written consent. If you received this by mistake, please reply and delete it to avoid recurrence.

Hi Jen,

I hope you had a lovely weekend — happy Monday!

I had another look at the setup, and it turns out invoices are only generating when the payment method is set to Credit Card (this has always been the case — no changes were made). One option is to remove this restriction so that every accepted proposal flows straight through to Xero. Would you like us to set it up that way, or would you prefer we continue leaving out “Pay Later”?

As for the duplicate invoices, would you mind giving us access so we can dig a little deeper? This will help us get to the bottom of what’s happening and put a proper fix in place. We’ve confirmed that Zapier itself is running correctly, we just need to trace where the duplicates are coming from.

Thanks so much, Jen — we’ll make sure this gets sorted quickly for you!

To add to the below:

Invoices weren't generating from the quote platform last week, it fixed itself for a day but now no invoice generates when someone selects pay via EFT. Maybe something to do with Zapier again?

Strangely we're also having invoices generate multiple times with different names, even after being paid via cc.

Warm regards,

Jen Lovegrove

ASSISTANT TO SENIOR PROPERTY STYLISTS



+61 450 909 043



+61 2 9310 1611



jlovegrove@novaricollective.com



Tenancy 1, Unit 1, 14A Baker Street Banksmeadow NSW 2019



NOVARICOLLECTIVE.COM.AU







The content of this email is confidential and intended for the recipient specified only. It is strictly forbidden to share any part of this message with any third party without the sender's written consent. If you received this by mistake, please reply and delete it to avoid recurrence.

Thanks. There hasn't been an invoice generated for 21 Pitt St Manly Vale or 64 Johnston Cres, Lane Cove North.

When people select pay later or pay via credit card the invoice generates. When they select EFT the invoice doesn't generate.

Last week Joel was looking into this and it had something to do with Zapier and Mailchimp - please see attached.

Warm regards,

Jen Lovegrove

ASSISTANT TO SENIOR PROPERTY STYLISTS



+61 450 909 043

Hey Jen,

Thanks for letting us know—and sorry for the late reply.

Just a quick heads-up: our senior dev will be taking a closer look to see what’s going on.

We’ll keep you posted as soon as we have an update.
might find this ticket useful po: https://secure.helpscout.net/conversation/3056115472/167500?viewId=2307528
Hey kuya @joel - maybe its their Zapier?
